alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 2:16AM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Louisiana, including the following parishes, Allen, Avoyelles, Beauregard, East Cameron, Evangeline, Lafayette, Lower Iberia, Lower St. Martin, Lower St. Mary, Lower Vermilion, Northern Acadia, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Rapides, Southern Acadia, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, St. Landry, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Martin, Upper St. Mary, Upper Vermilion, Vernon and West Cameron and southeast Texas, including the following areas, Hardin, Lower Jefferson, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Northern Orange, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Southern Orange, Tyler and Upper Jefferson. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Continued rounds of moderate to heavy rainfall are expected through Thursday morning adding additional totals on top of well saturated surfaces - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; West Cameron
